author: Sean Anderson

text:
If anybody would like a chance to play this game, you will find it at The Pinball Hall of Fame in Las Vegas, Nevada.
It's located not too far from the strip by heading east on Tropicana ave.
I was just there yesterday and it's a game I look forward to playing every time I go to Vegas, besides playing the slot machines.
author: POV-MHotel Reviews
